mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dict_t_factorcode ( TABLEID, DEID, COLUMNID, NAME, ORDERID, DBCOLUMNNAME, DATATYPE, DATALENGTH, SCALE, DEFAULTVALUE, CSID, ISVISIBLE, ISRESERVE, BGTLVL ) VALUES ( #{tableid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{columnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dbcolumnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datatype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{datalength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scale,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{defaultvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isvisible,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isreserve,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bgtlvl,jdbcType=CHAR} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE dict_t_factorcode
TABLEID = #{tableid},
DEID = #{deid},
COLUMNID = #{columnid},
NAME = #{name},
ORDERID = #{orderid},
DBCOLUMNNAME = #{dbcolumnname},
DATATYPE = #{datatype},
DATALENGTH = #{datalength},
SCALE = #{scale},
DEFAULTVALUE = #{defaultvalue},
CSID = #{csid},
ISVISIBLE = #{isvisible},
ISRESERVE = #{isreserve},
BGTLVL = #{bgtlvl}
COLUMNID = #{columnid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO P#DICT_T_FACTORCODE (year, province, tableid, deid, columnid, name, orderid, dbcolumnname, datatype, datalength, scale, defaultvalue, csid, isvisible, isreserve, dbversion, bgtlvl, status, insertversion) select year, ${province}, tableid, deid, columnid, name, orderid, dbcolumnname, datatype, datalength, scale, defaultvalue, csid, isvisible, ${isreserve}, dbversion, bgtlvl, status, insertversion from P#DICT_T_FACTORCODE t where Year=Global_MultYear_CZ.Secu_f_GLOBAL_PARM('YEAR') and t.status='1' and t.PROVINCE=Global_MultYear_CZ.Secu_f_GLOBAL_PARM('DIVID') and t.columnid not in(select f.columnid from P#DICT_T_FACTORCODE f where f.year=Global_MultYear_CZ.Secu_f_GLOBAL_PARM('YEAR') and f.status='1' and f.province=#{province} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM FASP_T_DICDSSOURCE d where d.GUID = #{tableID}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DICT_T_FACTOR f where f.CSID = #{tableID}
